Sentencas: Sulfur poisoning of cathode materials is one of the important factors to cause cathode performance degradation resulting in shortening lifetime of SOFC.
Titulo: Sulfur poisoning of La(Ni0.6Fe0.4)O3 cathode material for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The sulfur attacks alkali earth components of the rare earth-transition metal perovskite oxides, such as Ba, Ca, Sr, which reacts with SO2 to form sulfates.
Titulo: Sulfur poisoning of La(Ni0.6Fe0.4)O3 cathode material for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this work, the La(Ni0.6Fe0.4)O-3 (LNF) cathode material without alkali earth elements was employed to investigate the sulfur poisoning behavior by flowing 30 ppm SO2 at different temperatures of 500 degrees C-800 degrees
Titulo: Sulfur poisoning of La(Ni0.6Fe0.4)O3 cathode material for solid oxide fuel cells
Sulfur poisoning of La(Ni0.6Fe0.4)O3 cathode material for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It was found that SO2 readily reacts with the La2O3 component in LNF to form La2O2SO4 at 700 degrees C and 800 degrees C.
Titulo: Sulfur poisoning of La(Ni0.6Fe0.4)O3 cathode material for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The extent of the chemical reaction is temperature dependent.
Titulo: Sulfur poisoning of La(Ni0.6Fe0.4)O3 cathode material for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: These results confirm that sulfur poisoning also occurs in cathode materials free of alkali earth components.
Titulo: Sulfur poisoning of La(Ni0.6Fe0.4)O3 cathode material for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The study prompts the exploration of new materials and new strategies for the developing new cathode materials with high sulfur tolerance.
Titulo: Sulfur poisoning of La(Ni0.6Fe0.4)O3 cathode material for solid oxide fuel cells
